title: Prime 1 Studio's New Ghost Of Tsushima Statue Is Stunning
summary:
The Prime 1 Studio Showcase that premiered last Saturday revealed a bevy of fantastic large- and small-form collectibles.
Perhaps one of the most impressive statues shown was Ghost of Tsushima's Jin Sakai (you can see the statue at the 59:00 mark in the link above).
Prime 1 Studio has a reputation for making incredibly detailed work and this new Ghost of Tsushima statue definitely lives up to the hype.
A price for the statue and a pre-order date haven't been announced yet - although, based on previous Prime Studio 1 prices, this will probably cost a small fortune.
But, it's Jin Sakai from Ghost of Tsushima; why wouldn't you try to add him to your statue collection if you had the chance?
paragraphs: The Prime 1 Studio Showcase that premiered last Saturday revealed a bevy of fantastic large- and small-form collectibles. Perhaps one of the most impressive statues shown was Ghost of Tsushima's Jin Sakai (you can see the statue at the 59:00 mark in the link above). The legendary samurai can be seen standing atop a mound of rubble and stone steps; yellow leaves falling around him - just as they do in-game. There's even a fox by Jin's left foot, likely prepared to lead him to a nearby shrine. Prime 1 Studio has a reputation for making incredibly detailed work and this new Ghost of Tsushima statue definitely lives up to the hype.

A price for the statue and a pre-order date haven't been announced yet - although, based on previous Prime Studio 1 prices, this will probably cost a small fortune. But, it's Jin Sakai from Ghost of Tsushima; why wouldn't you try to add him to your statue collection if you had the chance?
